description.value:
Definition from the TBA specification: Identifikator som unikt identifiserer en virksomhet eller en kommunikasjonspart som tilhÃ¸rer en virksomhet i Adresseregisteret.
HER-id is an uniqe identifier for an organization or communication party belonging to an organization registered in the Adresseregisteret

usage.value: Organizations that participates in message based electronic communication in Norway uses a special identifier called HERid to identify the communication parties (e.g. kommunikasjonspart) of the organization.
